name: Study Buddies (camu)
description:
Made by Camu :)

Use MOUSE CLICK to control the character

(HINT: if you get stuck, try clicking on other objects in the room)

Tools used:

Blender, Unity, Audacity, Mixamo.com

Music:

Sunday Stroll - Huma-Huma (No Copyright Music) and Liborio Conti  - Salsa No Copyright Music

I also use and modify this 3D Model made by Alex Rivas

Thanks for playing!
